title: How should innovators or sinners be dealt with? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: so you have to understand that there is a difference between someone who exerts effort with honest uh uh uh Behavior to reach the verdict that would please Allah from someone who knows what is wrong those in the in the first instance the person should be taught and advised but in the second he should be warned and rebuked and we must always be aware that not everyone has the right to doad only those who have the tools and they're qualified to make such an assumption to issue such a verdict out of their knowledge and their background are accepted
